TopicTitle: RPM Enhanced Docking Ports v1.2.1 for KSP 1.1.3

Articles.Content:
About This Mod

This is a small MM patch that integrates JSI Radar and JSI External Camera from RPM into all of the stock docking ports. I love RPM and the features it provides, but always wished the external camera viewer was integrated directly into the docking ports. I then discovered the JSI Radar feature when I used the FASA Gemini RPM IVA from Flight Systems Redux and just loved it. I decided to integrate both the radar and the camera into the stock docking ports so that no extra parts were needed with the added advantage that they'll always be centered.

Dependencies:

Module Manager

Raster Prop Monitor

 

Recommended:

SSTULabs-added compatibility with SSTU Command Pods and docking ports

 

License: GPLv3 

Download: 

-GitHub

-Spacedock

Installation:

Extract "JSI Docking Ports" folder from ZIP file and copy it into your Gamedata folder. 

Enjoy!!

Edited August 25, 2016 by Jmullin
Updated Mod
Brilliant, congratulations! This is one of those little think a player dream for a long time.

Update v1.1

Changelog 

Released on 2016-08-11

-added SSTULabs compatablility

-fixed restricted tracking angle-accidently set to false and now reset to true 

-added README.txt file

Hey J-

Thanks for doing this mod.  IVA Docking is a big part of my gameplay.  I'm also a heavy user of SSTU, so I was really glad to see that you added that compatibility.  One thing though.  All of the SSTU CM and LM pods have integrated docking collars and your mod does not seem to work with them.  It works fine for the separate collars,  I discovered that if I stacked one of the separate collars on top of the integrated collar, the docking cam works fine. The CM launch escape shield doesn't sit correctly, and when you dock a CM to a LM you have a noticeable "Oreo cookie" effect but it's a workaround.

Would you be able to add the docking cam functionality to the pods?  or is that something I need to bring up in the SSTU forum.

Thanks again. 

Edited August 24, 2016 by thomash

Please remove the directory __MACOSX from the file, it is unnecessary

Also, please remove all the .DS_Store files, they are OSX files and again, are unnecessary

I would also suggest adding a .version file (see site http://ksp-avc.cybutek.net/ for details)

 

VERY IMPORTANT:  Remove spaces from file and directory names

 

Thanks

Edited August 24, 2016 by linuxgurugamer

Thanks for bringing this up. I developed this for RO/RSS gameplay and forgot that SSTU doesn't automatically add the camera like in RO. I'll take of that shortly.

Changelog v1.2.1

-reorganized file structure

-added JSI Camera Selector to SSTU parts

-included version file

 

Thanks for the tips and info. Still learning how to do all this so I appreciate the help and feedback.
Thanks J.  I'll put it to work tonight.
I was not able to set any ship or planet as target, changing "targetDockingPorts = false" fixed the problem.
